Title: Elevators
Explanation: Includes: Passenger and freight elevators of all types, including cars, enclosures, controls, safety equipment, hoistway equipment, and elevator machinery. Includes associated metal fabrications including pit ladders. |

Title: Lifts
Explanation: Includes: Vertical or inclined lifts and related equipment for a variety of purposes. Sidewalk lifts include doors. |

Title: Escalators
Explanation: Includes: Passenger conveying systems composed of moving treads installed in inclined position including associated components, hardware, controls, safety equipment, and related items. |

Title: Dumbwaiters
Explanation: Includes: Packaged and field assembled, motorized and hand- operated dumbwaiters including associated components for book lifts, cart lifts, and other applications. Systems include associated components, hardware, controls, and safety equipment. |

Title: Moving Ramps
Explanation: Includes: Passenger conveying systems composed of moving belts installed in inclined position including associated components, hardware, controls, safety equipment, and related items. |

Title: Moving Walks
Explanation: Includes: Passenger conveying systems composed of moving belts installed in horizontal position including associated components, hardware, controls, safety equipment, and related items. |

Title: Turntables
Explanation: Includes: Structural turntables for various applications. |

Title: Passenger Loading Bridges
Explanation: Includes: Operating bridges for loading and unloading of passengers to and from aircraft and ships. |

Title: Monorails
Explanation: Includes: Single rail vehicles suspended from or straddle the guideway. Includes associated track, equipment, controls, and accessories. |

Title: Funiculars
Explanation: Includes: Steep cable railways in which ascending cars counterbalance descending cars. Includes associated track, cable, |

Title: Cable Transportation
Explanation: Includes: Steep slope transportation system utilizing moving cable. Includes associated cable, support structures, equipment, controls, and accessories. |

Explanation: Includes: Hoisting towers, cranes, crane rails, and related accessories. |

Explanation: Includes: Manual and motor operated hoists and related accessories. |

Title: Derricks
Explanation: Includes: Manual and motor operated derricks and related accessories. |

Title: Conveyors
Explanation: Includes: Automatic guided vehicles, conveyors, diverters, and chutes. Includes controls and accessories. |

Title: Baggage Handling Equipment
Explanation: Includes: Operating equipment for handling, scanning, and weighing of baggage at terminals. Includes controls and accessories. |

Title: Chutes
Explanation: Includes: Chutes which support the operation of the building or structure. |

Title: Pneumatic Tube Systems
Explanation: Includes: Pneumatically operated tube system for the delivery of small items within a facility. Includes controls and accessories. |

Title: Elevating Platforms

Title: Powered Scaffolding
Explanation: Includes: Powered scaffolding when part of the completed project. |
